attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the 'John Lewis list' - MP's can claim items up to £23,000 per year (as quoted from the BBC News 24 web page), how can this be reasonable.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MPrenumeration/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
